articles.title: Asian Games discus throw champion Praveen Kumar Sobti, who boomed on small screen as Bhim, passes away - The Indian Express
articles.description: Ace of mace, the towering throws medallist from 60s and 70s and the much-adored actor dies at 74.
articles.content: Back in the late 1980s when four-time Asian Games gold medallist and Commonwealth Games silver medallist Praveen Kumar Sobti was cast as Bhim in the BR Chopra-epic Mahabharat, the six feet and five i… [+7827 chars]

articles.title: Bohol politician Niño Rey Boniel pleads guilty to killing wife - Rappler
articles.description: Gisela Boniel was the mayor of Bien Unido town and the first female commercial pilot hired by Philippine airline AirAsia. She was 40 when she was killed in 2017.
articles.content: CEBU, Philippines Niño Rey Boniel, former mayor of Bien Unido town in Bohol and provincial board member, pleaded guilty to homicide at a Lapu-Lapu City Court on Tuesday, February 8, for the 2017 kill… [+2046 chars]

articles.title: Chinese women's Asian Cup win sparks calls for gender pay equality - FRANCE 24
articles.description: The dramatic triumph of China's women footballers at the Asian Cup has sparked calls on social media for equal pay, with commenters contrasting their performance with the dismal men's side.
